modName: Repopulate Skyrim with Farm Animals and Birds
summary: Repopulate Skyrim with Farm Animals and Birds...
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size=5]Repopulate Skyrim with Farm Animals and Birds[/size][/b][/color] NO DLC needed


[b][i]Place farm animals and birds wherever you want through Skyrim ...[/i][/b]


39 animals (Chickens, Chick, Mallards, Duckling, Geese, Cows, Goats, Sheeps, Pigs, Young Wild Boar, Rabbits, Pigeons, Pheasants and Peacocks)

4 Explosive Chickens

You can mount a Sheep !

Pack Goat, White Goose, Speckled Chicken, Sheep mount, Rooster, Painted Cow, Young Wild Boar, and Piglet are following you

Place a cow statue ... The "cow" is walking !! ... Kill her ! … It's a statue !


New sounds (peacock with tail, chickens, pheasants, ram, painted cow, sheeps, goats, pigs, goose, pigeon, chick, duckling, mallards, rooster)

Warning: the ram is very aggressive !


[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française

Miscellaneous File: ESP (English) NO FOLLOWERS version [/color] (Except for Sheep mount)


In complement to this mod, you have my other mod: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/91142/?] Farm Animals and Co. [/url]


[url=http://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18022407593916616015577713.jpg][img]http://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/02/24//18022407593916616015577713.jpg[/img][/url]

[color=#ff0000][b] HORDES of Animals[/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly create hordes of creatures (5, 15, 50, 100 ...MORE ?...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these creatures, simply buy scrolls found with some Merchants in [color=#ff8c00]Riverwood [/color] (Merchants: [i] Orgnar at the Sleeping Giant Inn, Lucan Valerius at the Riverwood Trader[/i]) Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into creatures.

In order to find the scrolls at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list when you launch the game.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/jAATBCD.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/gbsaHZJ.gif[/img]

With the Sheep mount [b] if you want to be accompanied by a companion, it is possible with the mod [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13530/?] Horse Branding by fLokii [/url] (Easily mark any mount for followers to ride)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/0OWwSUg.gif[/img]


[color=#ff0000][b] Bugs or Problems[/b][/color]

No animals in the hands for: Peacocks, Chicks, Flaming chicken, Pigeon, Pheasants, Ducklings and Mallards

[img]https://i.imgur.com/sn9SOqo.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b] Credits[/b][/color]

The textures of Goats , Cows and Chickens are from [color=#ff0000] Bellyache [/color]; Mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3621/] Bellyaches Animal and Creature Pack [/url]("Asset use permission": "You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me").

[color=#ff0000]Macadamstreet [/color] for the meshes and textures of the pig and the goose in his mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125170176&searchtext=]Goosy goosa ! [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Jc1[/color] for the model of the Goose

[color=#ff0000] dogtown1 [/color]to convert the model of the Goose in skyrim, and for the model of the Pig

The meshes and textures of the Sheeps are from [color=#ff0000]stormshallow[/color] in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33273]Sheep Modders Resource [/url]

[color=#ff0000]Umar Muzammil[/color][url= http://www.youtube.com/umar6419]UMAR6419 [/url] for the model of the sheep in this site[url=http://thefree3dmodels.com/stuff/0-0-2014-0-17] The free 3D Models [/url] ("You are free to use these models in generating games, animations, multimedia, printed graphics, web graphics and others" and "you are free to distribute and modify the file as long as you attribute it's author(s)")

[color=#ff0000]cansu [/color] for the new texture of the Sheep in his mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37569]stormshallows sheep mod retextured [/url]

The mesh of the Flaming Chicken from [color=#ff0000]Darren83[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54369/?] New Spell -El Pollo Diablo- [/url]

[color=#ff0000]testiger2[/color] for the Mesh of the “Pack mule” for the goat in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68149/?] TesTiger's Mesh Resources [/url]

[color=#ff0000]KANRAx2[/color] with his Mod: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38138/?]yurufuwa rabbit [/url] ("Modders resources and tutorials") for the meshes and the textures of the rabbits, and the mod [url=http://skyrimshot.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-49.html]Kanra Follower [/url]+ [url=http://rim-rim-fox.tumblr.com/post/77800883762/kanrafollower-addon-2] kanrafollower_addon [/url]; [url=http://sala-mitzha.tumblr.com/] Blog of Kanra/Sala mitzha [/url]

[color=#ff0000]LorSakyamuni [/color] for the models of many animals in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76524/?] The Witcher 3 Monsters and Animals Resource Pack [/url] (“You are allowed to use the assets in this file without permission as long as you credit me”,“Pack containing a lot of monsters and animals included in the game The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt. All the original assets belong to [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD PROJEKT RED [/url] and are distributed with their permission. Feel free to use them, just remember to credit me.”). Some animals are rigged by [color=#ff0000] SpikeDragonLord and jboyd4 [/color] in the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76203/?]Beasts of Tamriel[/url]

[color=#ff0000] Mihail Romanov[/color] for some birds (Chick, Duckling, Mallards, Rooster, Pheasants) in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89772/] Pheasants Ducks and Chickens- Elements of Skyrim pt.13 (mihail immersive add-ons- animal- birds) [/url] , for the pigeon in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89548] Pigeons- Elements of Skyrim pt.12 (mihail immersive add-ons- birds)[/url], and for the peacocks in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81868/?] Peacocks- Mihail Monsters and Animals (mihail immersive add-ons- animals- birds) [/url] ("Feel free to use my mod in your projects, no need to ask me for permission first")

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url] - [url=https://www.freesoundeffects.com] free sound effects [/url]


[size=4][color=#ff0000]Mod 1[/color][/size] in this video

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]XNuKTcYaHBs[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-
